name: Switch Wishlist Discount Tracker (Japan Region)
description: Monitor your Nintendo Switch wishlist game discounts (Japan eShop only) and get reminded in the calendar when games go on sale, displaying original price, current price, and discount details.
author: Sidefy Team

game_ids.description: List of game IDs (NSUID) to monitor, separated by commas. Maximum 10 games supported. Example: 70010000063514,70010000027619
